title: Roy Orbison and friends: a black and white night
brief_description: Rob Orbison and his special guests took to the stage at the legendary Coconut Grove ballroom in Los Angeles on September 30, 1987. Joined by Bruce Springsteen, Elvis Costello, Tom Waits, Jackson Brown, Steve Soles, J.D. Souther, Bonnie Raitt, K.D. Laing and Jennifer Warnes, and backed by an all star band, Roy performed his legendary classics, including “Only the Lonely” and “Oh, Pretty Woman”, as well as a few new ones in a spellbinding hour of entertainment.
